channel.title: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?
channel.description:
well, a day or two ago, i've seen a vid of zezima's friend chat: what do people in god bless think zezima is? superman? think he's rich? (well there are people even richer then zezz) omg, anyway, what you people said was almost unreadeble "hi" (a 250times i think) "can i have free stuff?" (couldn't count number) and i even think its funny if noobs follow you and ask: " can i have some free stuff? " well, this will learn you to answer them, the 'rich style' way: french way:
'what?' *noobs following* 'can i have some fre stoef ??' *noob cant write =p* 'oh, erm, parlez-vous francais?' and noob will leave inmidiatly
english way (funny way to=p):
'what?' *noobs following* 'can i have some fre stoef ??' *noob cant write =p* 'oh sorry, i'm poor myself' 'you weer dragon chain thats 250mill!' 'lol, thats just 15m' 'and now you dun have $?' 'no..exept that 40m thats resting on my bank' then he'll still follow you, goto north (the wildy side) and normally the noob will leave directly =p
i have more fun with english style.. anyway, now what makes you a noob
1. call other people noobs, when they are'nt 2. ask people for free stuff 3. have zezima in your friends list (couse whenever he's online, you can't resist it to send something) 4. act like you where a member, but never was couse when the memb ask you questions, you might not answer (and when you find me ingame, i will know that you've never read this =p) 5. use protect melee from the qmallest attack you recieve (alike a rat) when where talking about quests and 90+ monsters, it doesn't make you noobish. 6. scamming
what provides you to not become a noob:
1. when in dueling/castlewars another player uses protect melee, call it a 'prayer nub' (this is a real noob then) 2. add zezz to your ignore list (only for real zezz haters =p) 3. have a lot of cash on your bank 5. dare to lie when it goes about buying something (this is called merchanting: nah i've seen that selling for ....k)
any more nooby things, add in a reply, if it are funny ways of noobs in non membs also tell them, couse that will make me even more laufgh. =p

@Porn_Star wrote:

Who are noobs…people who ask what noobs are and post about it on forums

Read full topic

@not2good wrote:

LOL slayer, are you kidding? Seriously shut up. I wasn’t even talking about you cause you didn’t post, so just be quiet. pl0x? Leacher, leecher who gives a crap, you knew what I meant obviously and that’s all I needed.

item.title: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?
item.dc:creator: @slayer215 slayer215
item.description:
@slayer215 wrote:

not2good:

omg, I can’t believe how serious half…no more like 3/4 of you are getting over a stupid thread. Who gives a bag of shit what a noob is. I mean wtf? I could think you are all a bunch of noob leacher whores but does that make it true? So everyone grow up and shut up.

Might not be a good idea to flame Paul. And you’re still a dumbass. And you spelled leecher wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Everyone has different opinions of what a noob is, i dont think it actually has a certain meaning... just a slang word...

All slang words have a meaning and none more specific than noob in the context of the Runescape world. It means you’re new, in mindset if not reality.

Read full topic
item.source: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?

@boberick wrote:

lol take these things thatv hapend 2 me.

im walking along on my lvl 73. lvl 8 with an iron helm and no pant on folows me... lvl 8 noob:omg youve got no armer u dumb noob! me:what? noob:noob!!!\11\\11\1\\11\\1 *i forgot the rest.*

item.source: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?

item.title: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

As somebody who has been playing game since early 2001, I can assure that nothing in this thread has anything to do with what makes somebody a noob or not.

Being a noob is using the word noob. Being a noob is playing Runescape 2. Being a noob is typing on forums in complete gibberish. Being a noob is dying in the wilderness. Being a noob is bowing down to the man. Being a noob is talking about Zezima. Being a noob is paying 5$ a month for a shitty java game. Being a noob is getting scammed by Jagex into thinking that Andrew Gowers great, original game, has anything to do with the shit being sliced and diced into a consumer package by the soulless drones who design things like “The Stronghold of Security” and the “Slug Invasion” or whatever bullshit they pull out of their asses next. Being a noob is making this thread.

Read full topic
item.source: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?

item.title: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

lol, for fight pits the same
you wanna kill somebody,
he runs away, when you get to him he prays…
fight pits is actully fight till the death:
with this, don’t use food (to waste)
and just go into it till you die.
ever heard the:
tzok-mak-jal-lol-tzi-… and whatever comes after it
fight for your life?
well fight pits true
the tokkul area untrue
couse there are npcs.

safturento
oh yeah, but thats ignorance =p

coatbridge
yeah, but whats the fun in that?
’ hey you ******* noob, get the **** away! ’
i really enjoy it to make noobs for fun =p
aspecially when they ask for items.

Read full topic
item.source: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?

item.title: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?
item.dc:creator: @safturento safturento
item.description:
@safturento wrote:

[quote=“Devil Dante, post:6, topic:12232”][quote author=safturento link=topic=18154.msg206825#msg206825 date=1157170004]
using prayer in a duel,castle wars,wildy,fightpits,etc. is not noobish…it was put into the game for a reason so dont cal people a noob because they play the game right…
[/quote]

It’s still annoying as hell :rolleyes:

Especially when it’s a fun duel -.-’[/quote]

ok fun duels i understand but things like fight pits when theres like 5 people on you and you pray and they call u a noob its like wtf its 5 on 1 and im not alowed to defend myself in any way and its the same thing with food its like when its 5 on 1 the 1 should be able to pray and eat without the rest o fthe people bitchin at him and the others can too i mean like i said its part of the fucking game

Read full topic
item.source: How to handle noobs? and what makes you one?

well, a day or two ago,
i’ve seen a vid of zezima’s friend chat:
what do people in god bless think zezima is?
superman? think he’s rich? (well there are people even richer then zezz)
omg, anyway, what you people said was almost unreadeble

i have more fun with english style…
anyway, now what makes you a noob

1. call other people noobs, when they are'nt 2. ask people for free stuff 3. have zezima in your friends list (couse whenever he's online, you can't resist it to send something) 4. act like you where a member, but never was couse when the memb ask you questions, you might not answer (and when you find me ingame, i will know that you've never read this =p) 5. use protect melee from the qmallest attack you recieve (alike a rat) when where talking about quests and 90+ monsters, it doesn't make you noobish. 6. scamming
